text: Reformatory is a 1938 American crime drama film directed by Lewis D. Collins and starring Jack Holt, Bobby Jordan and Charlotte Wynters.Shary & Mcinnes p.15 ==Synopsis== The inmates at a juvenile detention institution plan a mass breakout, despite the attempts of a new superintendent to bring in a more liberal regime. ==Cast== * Jack Holt as Robert Dean * Bobby Jordan as Pinkey Leonard * Charlotte Wynters as Adele Webster * Grant Mitchell as Arnold Frayne * Tommy Bupp as Fibber Regan * Frankie Darro as Louie Miller * Ward Bond as Mac Grady * Sheila Bromley as Mrs. Regan * Vernon Dent as Cook Howard * Greta Granstedt as Millie * Paul Everton as Gov. Spaulding * Lloyd Ingraham as Doctor Blakely * Joe Caits as Jim Leonard ==References== ==Bibliography== * Timothy Shary & Robin Mcinnes. Teen Movies: American Youth on Screen. Wallflower Press, 2005. ==External links== * Category:1938 films Category:1938 crime drama films Category:English-language films Category:American films Category:American crime drama films Category:Films directed by Lewis D. Collins Category:Columbia Pictures films
title: Reformatory (film)
